attributes.action: Protect the UK's dwindling hedgehog population before it's too late.
attributes.additional_details: This change will mean hedgehogs will be afforded greater protection and hopefully help their numbers recover.
attributes.background: Now the hedgehog has been listed as vulnerable to extinction in the UK, we are calling on the Government to move hedgehogs to schedule 5 of the Wildlife & Countryside Act 1981 to allow them greater protection.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300100
